repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary:
After the cover on the blank folio at the left lower margin ṣaṣṭha kā bhāṣya written in black pen in Granth and at the centre ṣaṣṭhakāṇḍabhāṣyaṃ pustakaṃ ta?pati. Manuscript has two parts. Separate supplementary sheet with the beginning of the 6th kāṇḍa is written on the white paper. There are 5 pages of this supplementary sheet. Number 6 is written in roman. 19 lines per folio. Text on the supplementary sheet: SS- 1v title kā. 6 phurvabhāgaḥ SS- 1v1 śrīgaṇeśaśāradāsatgurubhyo namaḥ . atha saumyasyādhvarasya SS- 1v 2 brāhmaṇaṃ saumyakāṇḍamārabhyate .. tatra prācinavaṃśaṃ karotī SS 1v-3 ti vidhiḥ …. SS-5v 18 naṃ vācayati .. iti ṣaṣṭhe kāṇḍe prathamapraśne prathamonuvākaḥ ..
After the last folio some lines in granth are found. The partial trancscript is given here. 1 karapuṣkarabhṛtakalaśabhṛta maṇimukta? pravālavakṣeṇa … 4 yugmān palekṣum? ña cāpaśaraiḥ tṛtīyā ca ….

msItem.title: Yajurvedabhāṣya 6th Kāṇḍa Bhaṭṭa Bhāskara bhāṣya
msItem.author: Bhaṭṭa Bhāskara
msItem.incipit: 1v 1 atha saumyasyādhvarasya brāhmaṇaṃ (rest of the line is damaged as the folio is torn.)
msItem.explicit: xv 7 (gap of 4 syllables due to damaged folio.) grahaṇāt yajamānārtha jyotirdadhāti utpādayati (gap of 4 syllables as the folio is torn.) t uttarasmin sva (gap of 1 syllable as the folio is torn.) prāptikāle svargasyānukramaiṇa prakāśanārthaṃ ojobhṛtāvīt (gap of some syllables as the folio is torn.) vācayati ..
msItem.finalRubric: xv 8 iti ṣaṣṭhe kāṇḍe prathamapraśne prathamonuvākaḥ ..

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin of the verso but many folio numbers are damaged as folio are torned.
supportDesc.condition: delicate. folio are torned and damged text.

listBibl.bibl: The Taittirīya saṃhitā of kṛṣṇayajurveda with the commentary of bhaṭṭabhāskaramiśra kāṇḍa 6, Vols 9-10 Edi. By A Mahādevaśāstri and Panditaratna K Raghavacarya Government Oriental Library Series, Bibliothica Sanskrit no. 14 Mysore Government Branch press 1897 .(Vol 1-10 available on archive org.)

TEI.text:
1v 1 atha saumyasyādhvarasya brāhmaṇaṃ (rest of the line is damaged as the folio is torn.)
xv 7 (gap of 4 syllables due to damaged folio.) grahaṇāt yajamānārtha jyotirdadhāti utpādayati (gap of 4 syllables as the folio is torn.) t uttarasmin sva (gap of 1 syllable as the folio is torn.) prāptikāle svargasyānukramaiṇa prakāśanārthaṃ ojobhṛtāvīt (gap of some syllables as the folio is torn.) vācayati .. iti ṣaṣṭhe kāṇḍe prathamapraśne prathamonuvākaḥ ..
